definitions.definition: The state or process of simmering.
definitions.example: The kettle was kept on the simmer.

definitions.definition: To cook or undergo heating slowly at or below the boiling point.
definitions.example: The soup simmered on the stove.

definitions.definition: To cause to cook or to cause to undergo heating slowly at or below the boiling point.
definitions.example: Simmer the soup for five minutes, then serve.

definitions.definition: To be on the point of breaking out into anger; to be agitated.
To remain angry with someone or something past the point of exhaustion; to resign oneself to holding a grudge, especially after some failed attempts to resolve a situation.
definitions.example: I tried to get through to him; all that's left for me to do is simmer.

definitions.definition: Someone who plays a sim (a simulation game), particularly The Sims.
